#!/bin/bash
# Mohist Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt -y install curl

# Go into main directory
if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server
fi

cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -z ${BUILD_VERSION} ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=https://api.mohistmc.com/project/mohist/${MC_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_VERSION}/download
else
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=https://api.mohistmc.com/project/mohist/${MC_VERSION}/builds/latest/download
fi

# Downloading jars
echo -e "Download link is ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
echo -e "Downloading build version ${BUILD_VERSION}"

curl -sSL -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}

# Checking if downloaded jar exists
if [ ! -f ./${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
    echo "!!! Error downloading build version ${BUILD_VERSION} !!!"
    exit
fi

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
